title: Furie
writer: Nha Uyen Ly Nguyen, Veronica Ngo, Nguyen Truong Nhan
short_cast: Van Veronica Ngo, Phan Thanh Nhien, Mai Cat Vi, Thanh Hoa, Pham Anh Khoa
cast: Van Veronica Ngo, Phan Thanh Nhien, Mai Cat Vi, Thanh Hoa, Pham Anh Khoa
genre: Vietnamese, Martial Arts Movies, Action & Adventure, Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: When traffickers kidnap her daughter from their village, vengeful Hai Phuong returns to Saigon -- and her outlaw roots -- to take down the abductors.
